column3: I'm not sure how effective fuzzing is for testing these kind of hash functions, in practice, as there is very little branching, but,  good to have this anyway.\nuACK fc7f84a9ca98ee0d9c2d1f092be6b5dba3f2a582
utACK :) fc7f84a9ca98ee0d9c2d1f092be6b5dba3f2a582\n`ConsumeRandomLengthByteVector` is cool, and the while consume<bool> is an interesting approach.
